meanings.sent1: She overdyes her clothes to make them brighter.
meanings.sent2: The fabric faded because she overdyes it too often.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally overdyes his socks pink instead of red.
meanings.sent4: The artist overdyes the canvas with vibrant colors, creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The hairdresser warns her clients not to overdyes their hair too frequently.

meanings.sent1: After the color faded, she overdyes her hair to refresh it.
meanings.sent2: He overdyes his t-shirt to cover up the stains.
meanings.sent3: She overdyes her scarf to match her new coat perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The painter overdyes the background to add depth to the painting.
meanings.sent5: He decides to overdyes his curtains to give them a new look.
